703622f-a.text:
Classon Avenue, east side, north from Prospect Place, showing the Jewish Hospital. View 2 shows the Prospect Place side of the
hospital.
View 3 is at the southeast corner of Classon and Prospect, showing the Brooklyn Home for Aged Men.
P. L. Sperr  September 14, 1941
NO REPRODUCTIONS  Views 1-3
703622f-a.folder: Classon Avenue & Prospect Place, Brooklyn, NY
